item.title: Tallow Balm for Cracked Heels: How to Use It for Soft, Healthy Feet
item.description: Tallow Balm for Cracked Heels: How to Use It Cracked heels are a common problem, especially in New Zealand’s dry or cold weather. Regular moisturizers don’t always help because they evaporate quickly and don’t soak deep enough. That’s where tallow balm comes in. If you’re looking for a natural solution, tallow balm for cracked heels is one of the best options. Why Use Tallow Balm for Cracked Heels? ✔ Deep Moisture – Unlike water-based creams, beef tallow for skin NZ penetrates deeply and stays locked in for longer hydration.
